entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:43 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of snow or rain. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow or rain. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
